data.lyric:
[ti:Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Brenda Lee]
[al:Little Jack Frost Get Lost]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree - Brenda Lee (布伦达·李)
[00:04.36]Lyrics by：Brenda Lee
[00:08.73]Composed by：Brenda Lee
[00:13.10]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:15.92]At the Christmas party hop
[00:20.02]Mistletoe hung where you can see
[00:22.67]Every couple tries to stop
[00:26.70]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:29.42]Let the Christmas spirit ring
[00:33.40]Later we'll have some pumpkin pie
[00:36.20]And we'll do some caroling
[00:40.06]You will get a sentimental feeling
[00:44.64]When you hear
[00:46.87]Voices singing let's be jolly
[00:50.25]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[00:53.74]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:56.48]Have a happy holiday
[01:00.52]Everyone's dancing merrily
[01:03.31]In the new old-fashioned way
[01:34.68]You will get a sentimental feeling
[01:39.18]When you hear
[01:41.27]Voices singing let's be jolly
[01:44.69]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[01:48.26]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[01:51.09]Have a happy holiday
[01:54.98]Everyone's dancing merrily
[01:57.93]In the new old-fashioned way
data.trans:
[ti:Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Brenda Lee]
[al:Little Jack Frost Get Lost]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:04.36]//
[00:08.73]//
[00:13.10]在圣诞树旁尽情摇摆
[00:15.92]在圣诞派对上跳一支舞
[00:20.02]槲寄生挂在你可以看见的地方
[00:22.67]每一对恋人都试图阻止我
[00:26.70]在圣诞树旁尽情摇摆
[00:29.42]让圣诞的气息响起
[00:33.40]等会我们吃点南瓜饼
[00:36.20]我们会唱颂歌
[00:40.06]你会有一种伤感的感觉
[00:44.64]当你听到
[00:46.87]歌声响起让我们开心起来
[00:50.25]用冬青树枝装饰大厅
[00:53.74]在圣诞树旁尽情摇摆
[00:56.48]度过一个愉快的假期
[01:00.52]每个人都在愉快地舞蹈
[01:03.31]用传统的方式
[01:34.68]你会有一种伤感的感觉
[01:39.18]当你听到
[01:41.27]歌声响起让我们开心起来
[01:44.69]用冬青树枝装饰大厅
[01:48.26]在圣诞树旁尽情摇摆
[01:51.09]度过一个愉快的假期
[01:54.98]每个人都在愉快地舞蹈
[01:57.93]用传统的方式
